source:
プロデューサー！　おっはよ★
いい朝だねー♪
translatedstr:
Producer!
Nice morning...........................

source:
おはよう、美嘉。
なんだ、ご機嫌じゃないか
translatedstr:
Good morning, Mika.
What a good mood you're in!

source:
まあね。ルミナスの活動があるし
張り切っていかなきゃ！
translatedstr:
Oh well, there's always the Luminous activity.
I have to stick it out!

source:
そうか、ありがたいよ。
美嘉から見て、ルミナスはどうだ？
translatedstr:
Well, I appreciate that.
From Mika's point of view, what about Luminous?

source:
すっごく刺激的★　みんなと一緒に笑って頑張って、
サイッコーに楽しいよ♪
translatedstr:
Very exciting★ Laughing and working hard with everyone,
It's a lot of fun!

source:
それなら良かった。
じゃあ、今日も１日頑張っていこう！
translatedstr:
Good then.
Well then, let's go on with our day!

source:
うん！
今日もよろしくね、プロデューサー！
translatedstr: Have a great day, producer!

source:
あそこにいるのは、美嘉かな？
おーい、美嘉！
translatedstr:
Is that Mika over there?
Hey, Mika!

source:
あっ、プロデューサーじゃん！　おはよっ！
調子はどう？
translatedstr:
Oh, it's the producer!
How are you doing?

source:
おはよう。俺は絶好調だぞ。
美嘉はどうなんだ？　元気にやれてるか？
translatedstr:
Good morning, I'm doing great.
How's Mika doing? How's she doing?

source:
あはは、アタシも超元気だよ♪
あ、そうだ、プロデューサーにお願いがあったんだ
translatedstr:
Haha, I'm super healthy too!
Oh, yeah, I had a favor to ask of my producer.

source:
今度、プロデューサーの意見も聞きたいから、
買い物に付き合ってほしいんだけど、どうかな？
translatedstr:
I'd like to hear what the producer has to say next time,
I need you to take me shopping.

source: ああ、俺で良ければ付き合うよ
translatedstr: Yeah, I'll go out with you if you want me to.

source:
やった！　約束ねっ★
よーし、今日も頑張っちゃうからね♪
translatedstr:
Yay! Promise!
Okay, I'll do my best again today.

source:
あはは、俺も負けずに頑張らないとな。
それじゃ事務所に行こうか
translatedstr:
Haha, I've got to keep up too.
Let's go to the office then.

source:
お疲れ、プロデューサー。
まだ仕事中？　終わったらちょっと話せるかな？
translatedstr: Are you still at work? Can I talk to you for a minute when you're done?

source:
美嘉、お疲れ様。今ちょうど終わったところだよ。
どうかしたのか？
translatedstr:
Mika, thanks for your hard work, we are just finishing up now.
What's wrong?

source:
えーっと……。プロデューサー、いつも一生懸命
プロデュースしてくれて……ありがとね
translatedstr:
Let's see, ....... Producers, always hard at work!
Thanks ...... for producing it!

source:
あ、いや、こちらこそ、いつもありがとう。
改まって、どうしたんだ？
translatedstr:
Oh, no, thank you for everything you do, too.
Again, what's going on?

source:
んー、ちゃんと伝えておきたいなって、思っただけ。
気持ちを伝えるって、大事なことでしょ？
translatedstr:
Hmm, I just thought I wanted to make sure you knew.
It's important to convey your feelings, isn't it?

source:
そうだな。じゃあ俺からも……。
美嘉、俺と一緒に頑張ってくれてありがとうな
translatedstr:
Right, well, you can get it from me at .......
Mika, thanks for hanging in there with me.

source:
うん！　これからもよろしくね、プロデューサー！
あ、アタシのこと、もっと頼ってね★
translatedstr:
Yeah! Keep up the good work, producer!
Oh, you can count on me more.

source:
やっほー、プロデューサー★
今日もヨロシクね！
translatedstr:
Hey there, producer!
I look forward to seeing you again today!

source:
あっ、プロデューサー！　おはよー★
へへへ、朝から会うなんて、ラッキー♪
translatedstr:
Oh, producer!
Hehehe, lucky me to see you in the morning... ♪

source:
お疲れ様、プロデューサー♪
明日も頑張ろうね★
translatedstr: Let's work hard tomorrow.

source:
お先に失礼しまーす！　あ……ヤッバ、友達から
メッセージがいっぱい……。早く返信しないと～
translatedstr:
Good bye! Oh, ...... yabba, from a friend.
Lots of messages at ....... I need to reply soon~!

source:
（美嘉に、雑誌のグラビア企画
『ＪＫ百Ｋ』のオファーが来たぞ）
translatedstr:
(Mika for a gravure project for a magazine)
(I've got an offer on the table for "JK 100K.")

『ＪＫ百Ｋ』って、ＪＫモデルたちが
いろんなテーマで撮影するやつだよね？
translatedstr:
JK Hyakka" is a magazine that features JK models.
You know, the ones where they shoot on different themes?

source: ああ、今回もいくつかテーマを用意してあるぞ
translatedstr: Yeah, we've got a few themes for you this time around.

source: どんなテーマかもう決まってるの？
translatedstr: Do you already know what the theme will be?

source: 候補はもうもらってるぞ、ほら、これだ
translatedstr: I've already got a candidate for you. Here you go.

へえ、いっぱいあるじゃん！
……学校の教室で撮影かぁ、楽しそうだね♪
translatedstr:
Wow, that's a lot of stuff!
...... shooting in a school classroom...sounds like fun...

source:
アイドルの裏側をテーマに、レッスン風景の撮影……
あ、ギャル全開っていうのもあるね、面白そう

Shooting a lesson on the theme of the other side of idols: ......
Oh, there's also the whole "gal" thing. Sounds interesting.

ああ。どれで撮影するかは、美嘉の意見を
聞きたいそうだ。美嘉はどれがいい？
translatedstr:
Oh...which one to shoot with, Mika's opinion.
Mika wants to know, which one do you prefer?

source:
うーん、悩んじゃうな。どれも楽しそうだけど、
せっかくの単独グラビアだし……
translatedstr:
Hmmm, I'm torn...they all sound fun,
It's a solo gravure. ......

source:
やっぱ、いつもと違うアタシを見せたいよね★
ねえ、プロデューサーはどれがいいと思う？
translatedstr:
I want to show a different side of me, don't I?
Hey, which one do you think the producer would like?

source: 美嘉の単独グラビアのテーマか……

source: 学校での撮影
translatedstr: Shooting at School

source: プライベート風
translatedstr: private style

source: レッスン風景

source: もっとギャル全開で
translatedstr: More gal full throttle.

source:
学校での撮影がいいと思う。美嘉のクラスメイトに
なった気分が味わえて、ファンも喜びそうだ
translatedstr:
I think a school shoot would be good for Mika's classmates.
I'm sure fans will be happy to feel like they've become a part of it.

source:
やっぱそうだよね！
アタシもいいなって思ってたんだ♪
translatedstr:
I knew it!
I thought it was nice, too.

source:
よーし、せっかく学校で撮影するなら、
オフっぽいアタシを見せちゃおっかな♪
translatedstr:
Okay, if you're going to shoot at a school,

source:
ああ、いいんじゃないか。
等身大の美嘉も魅力的だと思うぞ
translatedstr:
Yeah, it's fine.
I think life-size Mika is attractive, too.

source:
（学校で授業を受けたり、廊下で話す……そんな
等身大の美嘉の写真に、ファンからは絶賛の声が！）
translatedstr:
(Take a class at school or talk in the hallway ...... such

source:
（雑誌の売れ行きもかなり良かったらしく、
他の仕事も舞い込んできたぞ！）
translatedstr:
(Apparently, the magazine sold quite well,
(Other jobs are on the way, too!)

プライベート風がいいかな。グラビアの中でも
人気の高いテーマだし、いいんじゃないか？
translatedstr:
I think I'd prefer a private wind...in the gravure.
It's a popular theme, and it's a good one.

確かに。じゃあ、アタシのプライベート、
ちょーっとだけ……見せちゃおうかな★
translatedstr:
Certainly...then, Atashi's private,
I'll show you a little bit of ......

本当に自分の部屋にいるみたいな雰囲気で、
リラックスしちゃおーっと♪
translatedstr:
The atmosphere was really like being in your own room,

source:
（宣言通り、リラックスした自然体の美嘉の
表情に、ファンも大満足だったようだ）
translatedstr:
(As declared, Mika's relaxed and natural
(Fans seemed to be very satisfied with the expressions on their faces.)

source:
（今回のグラビアは各方面でも話題になり、
美嘉の評価も上がったぞ！）
translatedstr:
(This gravure became a topic of conversation in various fields,
(Mika's rating just went up!)

source:

translatedstr:
How about the lesson scene?

source:

(The photos convey a sense of dynamism, both the glowing sweat and the serious expressions on their faces.

（ＪＫ向けの雑誌なので、

translatedstr:
(It's a magazine for JK,

もっとギャル全開で！　っていうのが

I'm more of a full-blown gal!

(Mika responded to my request,

（しかし、やりすぎてしまい、他のモデルに比べて

translatedstr:
(But it was overdone and compared to other models.
(......), which was kept in storage because it was too conspicuous.

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）

source:
（美嘉はアイドル番組の中の１コーナー、

(Mika is one corner of an idol program,
(She's participating in a winner-takes-all dance battle.)

はぁ……はぁ……プロデューサー、

Hah ...... Hah ...... producer,

Good job, Mika! We've won so far, though,

何回も連続で踊るから、結構キツイかも……

That's right.

source:
ダンスバトルの勝ち抜き戦だからな。

It's a winner-take-all dance battle.
We're in the second half of the season now, and we'll see if we change our strategy.

source:
そうだね……。うん、そうしよっか。
プロデューサー、なにかアイディアあったりする？

Yes, ....... Yeah, let's do that.

Yes, ....... I have a few policies regarding the second half of the season.

source:
分かった！
じゃあ後半戦の作戦は……

source: 見せ場を意識

それじゃあ、後半戦に行ってくる！
アタシのカッコいいダンスから、目を離さないでね★

Well then, I'm off to the second half!

（美嘉のキレのあるダンスに、観覧席も

(Mika's sharp dance moves the audience in the bleachers.

So the goal is to finish the race, ok!

source: じゃあ、後半戦は抑え気味で頑張ってくるね！

（結果、美嘉は決勝戦で敗退してしまったが、

(As a result, Mika lost in the finals, though,

(As a result, there was a lot of excitement around the start of the second half of the season,

source:
（結局、リタイアすることになり、

(Eventually, I had to retire,

いや構わないよ。ただ……少し答えにくそうに

translatedstr:

自分だったら

think about whether or not to ...

なんとなく

for some reason or another
speak from one's imagination

他の子の……。あっ！　それなら話せそう！
うん、この前聞いた恋バナがピッタリ★

You can find the other kids at ....... Oh! Then I can talk to them!

（友達の話をうまくごまかして話しつつ、

cute

source:
む、虫～？　アタシはちょっと……パス！
もっとアガるとこ行こうよ〜！
translatedstr:
Mui, insect~? I'm a little ...... pass!
Let's go somewhere more aggravating!

source: （あんまり喜んでもらえなかったみたいだ……）
translatedstr: (I don't think she was too happy about it. ......)

source:
（休憩中、美嘉がやってきた。最近ルミナスの間で、
メンバーのモノマネが流行っているらしい）
translatedstr:
(During a break, Mika came to me, recently among the Luminas,
(Apparently, impersonations of the members are all the rage.)

source:
アタシ、このモノマネめっちゃ自信あるんだ★
絶対当ててよね！
translatedstr:
I'm really confident in this impersonation.
You'll definitely have to guess!

source: それじゃ、行くよ～
translatedstr: Okay, I'll be there.

source:
『あらあら、困ったわね……。
ここはどこかしら～？』
translatedstr:
'Oh dear, you're in trouble. ......
Where am I?

source:
おお！
もしかして、このモノマネは……
translatedstr:
Oh!
Perhaps this moniker is ......

source: あずさ
translatedstr: Azusa

source: 歌織
translatedstr: Kaori

source: 菜々
translatedstr: Nana

source: あずささんだな！
translatedstr: Azusa!

source:
そう、正解！　やっぱ似てるよね？
結構練習したんだ★
translatedstr:
Yes, you're right! I knew it! They look alike, don't they?
I've practiced a lot.

source: （よし、正解！　美嘉もご機嫌だな）
translatedstr: (Okay, you're right! Mika's in a good mood.)

source: 歌織さん……かな？
translatedstr: Is this ......, Kaori-san?

source:
あー、そう聞こえちゃう？
もっと練習しなきゃだね
translatedstr:
Uh, does it sound like that?
I need to practice more.

source: （答えを間違えてしまったみたいだ……）
translatedstr: (I think I got the answer wrong: ......)

source: えーっと……菜々……？
translatedstr: Let's see ...... Nana ......?

source:
いやいや、もっとよく聞いて！
だいぶ違うタイプじゃん？
translatedstr:
No, no, no, listen more carefully!
They're very different types, aren't they?

source:
（美嘉が落ち込んでしまった。
正解できなかったのが悔やまれる）
translatedstr:
(Mika became depressed.
(I'm sorry I didn't get it right.)

source:
（美嘉の仕事終わり、
気分転換を兼ねて出かけることにした……）
translatedstr:
(Mika's end of work,
I decided to go out for a change (......)

source:
（もうこんな時間か……。
美嘉も楽しんでくれたようだな）
translatedstr:
(Is it that time already? .......
(I see Mika enjoyed it as well.)

source:
今日は楽しかったね。お疲れさま、プロデューサー。
また今度、息抜きしようねっ★
translatedstr:
I had a great time today...good job, producer.
Let's take a break again sometime.

source:
あー、やっぱ、気分転換は大事だよね♪
さーて、心機一転！　明日から張り切っていこう！
translatedstr:
Ah, I knew a change of scenery was important... ♪
Well, let's make a fresh start!
